amendment.description: To provide that, of the amount authorized to be appropriated for the use of the Department of Defense for research, development, test, and evaluation for Defense-wide activities, up to $5,000,000 may be available for the rapid mobilization of the New England Manufacturing Supply Chain Initiative.

action.text: Amendment SA 1911 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Snowe.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1911 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
